c-1: ^Aww! Try it and see how you feel afterwards

BreathingMain: ^Let's get started with the first breathing exercise.
^> I want you to inhale for about 5 seconds! and then I want you to exhale for 5 seconds! </color>
^Thats the breathing done! How do you feel?

c-0: ^That's good to hear! I'm sure you're well relaxed now!
c-1: ^You're just not used to the exercises yet!
^You can try again on your own accord before hitting the continue button

StretchingSection: ^We're just going to do a simple <color=
^> stretch pose and I'm gonna need you to hold onto it for a couple of seconds!</color>
^That was good. I'm sure your body feels a lot more nicer. Those muscles feeling better already!?

c-0: ^They're about to feel even better after this next pose!
c-1: ^Well, they're about to feel even better after this next pose!

StretchingSection2: ^I'm already feeling a lot better. Most of my muscles are already relaxed. I hope yours are better than before!

c-0: ^I'm glad that my programme is working for you!
c-1: ^I got one more chance to make this work for you!

StretchingSection3: ^That's good you can stop it there!

c-0: ^That's good to hear. I'm glad that stretch went well for you!
c-1: ^That's devastating, You can still redo the stretch again to see if it goes your way this time!

Closing: ^That's all for the Stretching exercises. How do you feel about them?

c-0: ^I'm glad to hear that the stretches have worked well for you. With your muscles now rested you can freely move to the next exercise!
c-1: ^I'm sorry about that. You can repeat the exercises on your own accord if you couldn't get it right the first time! If you don't want to, you're free to move onto the next exercise!

NextClosing: ^Now for our final exercise we are going to <color=
^> write messages into a small diary </color>.
^> write a list of encouraging words to yourself or you can write down your current thoughts and feelings onto the page</color>!
^Whether it's your anxieties or your current struggles, You're free to write down anything as you please, don't be afraid to write it all down!
